did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Lambda Alpha International Ely Chapter records, 1944-1985.
did.physdesc: Correspondence, reports, printed material, and organizational records.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Newsletters, clippings, programs, and records of chapter meetings. Also, records of chapter while Leonard H. Scane was president (1944-1981) including correspondence, programs, committee reports, directories (1946-47), booklets, other records, and clippings.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Ely Chapter is based in Chicago, Illinois.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Newsletters, clippings, programs, and records of chapter meetings. Also, records of chapter while Leonard H. Scane was president (1944-1981) including correspondence, programs, committee reports, directories (1946-47), booklets, other records, and clippings.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Lambda Alpha International. Ely Chapter. Records, #3960. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

odd.head: NOTES
odd.p: Part of Lambda Alpha Literary Archives.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of a single box. Online guide unavailable.
